entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 p.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 7:10 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.1°C

Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 94 %
